media:group.media:title: The Legit programming language
media:group.media:description:
You've used git for tracking code before, right? But if we used git *as* code? 

That which question nobody was asking is exactly what today's esolang is about - an esolang which executes instructions based on the git commit tree. 

Legit official site
https://morr.cc/legit/
Legit on Github
https://github.com/blinry/legit
Legit on esolangs
https://esolangs.org/wiki/Legit
